name: Grave Mistake (AJHeyen)
description:
Team Name: Kiwis Against Capitalism (K.A.C.)

Team Members: AJ Heyen (Artist), Keolani Baumgart (Artist), Zoom Coe (Coder)

GAME:

During the day, cut grass to earn money to dig graves. At night, drag ghosts into graves to earn points. Don't get touched by ghosts!

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Dig Grave - G

Cut Grass/ Grab Ghosts - Space Bar

Quicktime Event - Arrow Keys
